name: Oil Tanker Truck Fuel Cargo
description:
Welcome to Oil Tanker Transport Truck - Fuel Hill Cargo!!
Imagine highways and 5 lane roads without any traffic? This can be the result if oil tankers do not supply fuel to the city petrol stations. In this Oil Tanker Truck Simulator 2017, you are going to perform the most important transportation tasks ever, to keep the city running. You do not have any room for mistakes, show your oil tanker driving skills on almost every track possible on the planet. Your ultimate duty is to make sure continuous oil supply to off road gas stations. Let’s start playing the oil tanker transporter truck game with excellent driving skills to control heavy duty trailer on offroad tracks.

Oil Tanker Simulator 2018 is a driving game in which you have to drive a long heavy truck with oil tanker attached at the back. Now put your hands on the oil transport tanker steering and be the lead oil dealer of the town. Challenge your heavy duty tanker driving skills to become an expert driver of this heavy fuel transporter truck. Oil Tanker Truck Simulator 2017 is one of the best liquid fuel transporter game with an ultimate fun of oil tanker parking & driving simulator experience.

Features:
- Driving Experience of Heavy Duty Transporter Truck
- Driving Fun on Mountain Roads as well as in Real City Traffic
- Unique Conceptual Mountain Oil Transportation real life game
- HD Graphics with Amazing Gameplay
- Real life oil transportation physics engine
- Smooth controls on sloppy tracks
- Three different camera angles
- Career mode with large missions to complete
